pullRequest.title: GEODE-8269: Improve test coverage
pullRequest.bodyText: Analyzed test coverage via Intellij and by looking through all tests.  There were some test cases missing.  We either added them or created additional stories in Tracker.

nodes.bodyText: Can this be a assertThatThrownBy assertion?
Maybe the same thing, but at least for consistency, assertThat should come from the org.assertj.core.api.Assertions package.
